DOC.brief_title: Crossover Study With MultiHance v Comparator Peripheral MRA
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent At least 18 yrs age Moderate severe peripheral arterial disease Willing undergo two MRA procedure within 14 day Pregnant lactate Known allergy one ingredient product Therapeutic intervention arterial territory interest two MRA exam Changes symptoms two exam Vascular stent area interest Severe claustrophobia Congestive heart failure class IV Scheduled undergo surgery PAOD two exam Scheduled undergo DSA two exam
